organizations: Sons of Israel Synagogue (South Bend, Ind)
lead_paragraph: An Indiana synagogue that was last used in 1991 underwent a $1 million restoration to become the shop for what is now the Chicago Cubs’ Class A affiliate.
snippet: An Indiana synagogue that was last used in 1991 underwent a $1 million restoration to become the shop for what is now the Chicago Cubs’ Class A affiliate.
